title: Its 2017 which champion are you rooting for?
body:
Some champions have been left in the dark while some have been in the bright light for too long
Which champion are you rooting for in 2017?

Which champ do you hope will get the next legendary/ultimate skin?

I myself am hoping for a ultimate {{champion:45}} skin!!
my roots are going for urgot update one day!
mehehehehehehe
